pages.text: Appears in:$(li)DX Rider Gochizo Special Set -Tirol Choco Collaboration Ver- (2025, toyline)$(br2)Used to access Valen's $(l:gavv/riders/valen#tirol)Tirol$(/l) form
Obtained by eating $(l:misc/items/chocolate_bar)Chocolate Bars$(/l) with a $(l:gavv/items/blank_gochizo)Blank Gochizo$(/l) in your inventory
